alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 2:53PM MST until January 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
